name: Sheep Defense
description:
Hungry bears and crazy wolves are after your flock of soft, fluffy sheep and it’s up to you and a friend to control two brave, valiant sheep dogs and protect the herd. Howl, bark or even unleash a super powered growl to scare away ferocious invaders. But bark too much and your stamina may decrease leaving you temporarily powerless to protect your cute cuddly friends.

Recommended for two players and playable on a single PSP® system only.

Download Sheep Defense today!
